name: Shadows Fears
description:
Se trata de un pequeño juego narrativo con toques de terror en el que hay que tomar decisiones en base a preguntas de sí o no. Este juego fue creado para la FAD Game Jam 2019 en menos de 48 horas.

it's a little narrative game with touches of terror in which the player have to make decisions based by yes or no questions. This game was created for the FAD Game Jam 2019 in less than 48 hours. The game is in Spanish.
